data: PRIVACY POLICY OF VIBROSAVER SERVICE
Updated on: 1/1/2019
Come into force date: 1/1/2019

You have purchased our VibroSaver smart devices and start to use the VibroSaver app with all its functionalities! Any information you share with us (e.g. while setting up the VibroSaver account) will help us to provide you with services related to VibroSaver device and to make them even better. We explain here the ways of collecting and using information, and how we protect your privacy. In this privacy policy, "personal data" means information that can be used to identify an individual either from the information alone or from other information we have access to about the individual. We collect both personal and non-personal data to enable and facilitate the best user experience possible.
WHAT INFORMATION IS COLLECTED AND HOW DO WE USE IT?

To provide our services to you, we will ask you to provide necessary personal data that is required to provide those services. If you do not provide your personal data, we may not be able to provide you with our products or services.
VibroSaver Account Information
label: collection

data: Collected data during the VibroSaver Account creation may include photo(doesn't need to include a face or characterize a person), timezone, user name, and Personally Identifiable Information (PII) like your email address or mobile phone number. These information help to activate, manage and get service of VibroSaver. Your nickname, profile picture, country and time zone will be connected to your account so that you can access our product and service conveniently.
label: collection

data: User Device Information
label: collection

data: Your device identifier, IP address, OS version, country, etc will be collected so you can receive PUSH notifications.
label: collection

data: VibroSaver Device Information
label: collection

data: VibroSaver device identifier, IP address, MAC address, firmware version, etc. will be collected so that you can setup and manage your alarm clocks and control your device remotely via VibroSaver app.
label: collection

data: HOW THE PERSONAL DATA IS USED
The personal data we collect will be used to let you use the VibroSaver app and control the VibroSaver devices purchased from us.
label: collect_purpose

data: To provide you with our products and services, to ensure the functions and safety of our products, to verify your identity, to prevent and trace fraudulent or inappropriate usage.
label: collect_purpose

data: To develop our products and services, together with general and statistical information.
label: collect_purpose

data: To communicate with you, including notifications on products and services that are updated or launched.
label: collect_purpose

data: To provide marketing and promotional materials about our products and services (please note that you can unsubscribe anytime).
label: collect_purpose

data: To personalize product design and to provide you with services tailored for you, for example, recommending and displaying information and advertisements regarding products suited to you, and to invite you to participate in surveys relevant to your use of VibroSaver product and service.
label: collect_purpose

data: To conduct investigations regarding our products and services.
label: collect_purpose

data: If you participate in our lottery, contest or other promotions, we may use your personal data to manage such activities.
label: collect_purpose

data: To provide maintenance services, monitor software licenses, improve our products or analyze the efficiency of our operations.
label: collect_purpose

data: WHO DO WE SHARE YOUR INFORMATION WITH?

Unless we tell you in this privacy policy, we will keep your personal information confidential. Disclosure may include the scenarios listed in this section below. In each case described in this section, you can be assured that VibroSaver will only share your personal data in accordance with your consent. You should know that when VibroSaver shares your personal data with a third party under any circumstance described in this section, VibroSaver will ensure that the third party is subject to practices and obligations to comply with the relevant data protection and privacy laws of your country. VibroSaver will contractually ensure compliance by any foreign Third-Party Service Providers with the privacy standards that apply in your home jurisdiction.
DISCLOSURE TO THIRD-PARTY SERVICE PROVIDERS

In order to conduct business operations smoothly, the VibroSaver entity which collects your personal data may disclose your personal data from time to time to our third party service providers which are our mailing houses, delivery service providers, telecommunications companies, cloud service providers, data centers, data storage facilities, and customer service providers, agents, related corporations, and/or other third parties (together "Third Party Service Providers"). Such Third-Party Service Providers would be processing your personal data on VibroSaver's behalf or for one or more of the purposes listed above.
label: sharing

data: Personal data will only be shared by VibroSaver to provide or improve our products or services and will not be shared for use for marketing purposes.
label: share_purpose

data: DISCLOSURE TO OTHERS
VibroSaver may disclose your personal data without further consent if required or permitted by law in the following cases:
Cases in which the disclosure is required or authorized based on the applicable laws and/or regulations;
label: share_purpose

data: Cases in which the disclosure is necessary to respond to an emergency that threatens the life, health or safety of the individual or another individual;
label: share_purpose

data: Cases in which the disclosure is necessary for the prevention of crime or legal proceedings;
label: share_purpose

data: Cases in which the purpose of such disclosure is clearly in the individual's interests, and if consent cannot be obtained in a timely way;
label: share_purpose

data: Cases in which the disclosure is necessary for any investigation or proceedings;
label: share_purpose

data: Cases in which the disclosure is to any officer of a prescribed law enforcement agency upon production of written authorization signed by the head or director of that law enforcement agency, or a person of a similar rank, certifying that the personal data is necessary for the purposes of the functions or duties of the officer; and/or
label: share_purpose

data: Cases in which the disclosure is to a public agency and such disclosure is necessary in the public interest.
label: share_purpose

data: OTHER INFORMATION

We use statistical data that does not specifically identify you (non-personal data) to help in our operations and improve our products and services and provide a better user experience for you. Here are some of the non-personal data we may collect and how we use them:
label: collect_purpose

data: When you create a VibroSaver Account, download our software, register in our e-commerce website, participate in online surveys or interact with us in other ways, we may collect your language preferences, country, postal code, area code number and time zone in which you use our products and services.
label: collection

data: When you opt-in to participate in our User Experience Improvement Program, we may gather statistics relating to your use of our products functions, on an anonymous basis. This may include information relating to your use of our official website, products and services. If there is an abnormal shutdown or breakdown, we may collect information relating to your mobile device to diagnose the problem.
label: collection

data: When you use our website, online services, interactive applications, email messages and advertising, we may use cookies and other technical elements (e.g. pixel labels) to collect and store non-personal data. These enable us to provide you with a better experience and improve our overall service quality, e.g. in saving your preferred language settings, sending emails in a readable format, to determine whether the emails have been opened or not, etc.
label: collection
collect_purpose

data: When you use the Internet browser in using our products and services, we may collect log information, e.g. IP address, browser type, language, reference source, operating system, date and time marking and click rate data. When you first use and activate your VibroSaver device, the device's unique identification code and approximate geographical information may be collected.
label: collection

data: INFORMATION RETENTION PERIOD

We will retain your information for the period necessary to achieve the purposes set out in this personal information protection policy, unless required or permitted by law to do so for a longer period.
DELETE INFORMATION
If you want, you can delete all the following information via "Settings - Profile - Account Security - Deactivate Account" on VibroSaver app.
VibroSaver Account Information
User Device Information

YOUR OPTION

You have confirmed that you have read, understand and receive all the content of this privacy policy before you agree or in other ways to use the services from VibroSaver. Once you use this service, you agree to all the provisions of this personal information policy. If you do not agree with this personal information policy, you shall not use the service provided by us.
INFORMATION SAFETY SAFEGUARDS

Various preventive measures will be taken to protect your personal information from loss, theft and misuse, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration or destruction. To ensure the security of your personal information, our company has strict information security regulations and procedures, and has a dedicated information team to strictly implement the above measures within the company. Your information is stored on the servers. For security and backup purposes, we may store your information and data on the servers of other affiliated companies.
COMPLAINTS AND FEEDBACK
If you have any questions or concerns about our personal information policy or data processing, just let us know by support@VibroSaver.com.
POLICY UPDATE

We may revise and update this policy at any time and issue a notice on the website 30 days in advance. If you continue to use the related services of the VibroSaver platform on the date when the amendment update officially takes effect, you will be deemed to agree to our revision update.
